TEXT.TITLE: KAUFMAN AND BROAD <KB> FILE STOCK OFFER
TEXT.BODY: Kaufman and Broad Inc said it registered with the Securities and Exchange Commission to offer up to two mln shares of common stock. First Boston Corp and Merrill Lynch Capital Markets will be the underwriters for the offering. Reuter
